# Writtter

## Install

Locally:

```bash
git clone git@github.com:g-ongenae/writtter.git

# Back (cd back)
npm install

# Front (cd front)
npm install
```

On docker:

```bash
git clone git@github.com:g-ongenae/writtter.git

# Back (cd back)
docker build

# Front (cd front)
docker build
```

## Run

Locally:

```bash
# Back (cd back)
npm start

# Front (cd front)
npm start

open https://localhost:8080
```

On docker:

```bash
# Back (cd back)
docker run

# Front (cd front)
docker run
```

Test:

```bash
# Back (cd back)
npm test

# Front (cd front)
npm test
```
